loonR 0.2.15
  • Reference

    Generate gene pair value

    Source: R/Biomarker.R
    generatePairValue.Rd

    Generate gene pair value

    generatePairValue(value = NULL, names = NULL, sep = "_")

    Arguments

    sep

    Pair seperation

    Value

    Examples

    
set.seed(111)
v = rnorm(10)
n = paste0("ID", 1:10)
names(v) = n
loonR::generatePairValue(v,n)
